resume_builder_description: Generate resumes based on your profile
empty_resume_content: Resume content is empty, cannot optimize
calling_ai_service: Calling AI service to optimize resume...
optimization_retry_later: Resume optimization failed, please try again later
delete_resume_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this resume? This action cannot be undone.
profile_load_error: Unable to load profile data, please refresh and try again
profile_data_filled: Your profile information has been automatically filled, you can modify as needed
no_profile_data: No profile data found, please fill in manually
update_resume_description: Update your resume information to keep it current
create_resume_description: Create a new resume to showcase your skills and experience
fill_target_fields: Please fill in target position, target job and resume content
generate_tailored_resume_tip: Click the button to use AI to generate a tailored resume based on your basic resume and target position
responsibilities_placeholder:
Describe your main responsibilities and achievements, for example:
• Led frontend development for Project X using React and TypeScript
• Optimized page loading speed, improving performance by 30%
• Led a team of 3 to complete key features
skills_placeholder:
List your professional skills, for example:
• Frontend: React, Vue, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3
• Backend: Node.js, Express, MongoDB
• Tools: Git, Docker, Webpack
• Languages: JavaScript, Python, Java
